channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: A collection of notes about learning Thai language.

item.title: Describe a picture - Chilli
item.description: Chilli … if you went to Thailand without encounter chilli, you were in the wrong country ^^

item.title: Describe a picture - Train
item.description: Who didn’t took the night train from Bangkok to Chiang Mai ? It’s a great experience

item.title: Describe a Picture - House
item.description: Welcome to that new series of stuff that I want to do to improve my Thai.

item.title: Weekly work - 01 July
item.description: This week, I’ve worked mainly on http://thai-notes.com/typing/typingtrainers.shtml to master the Thai keyboard. I’ve reached the lesson 25 so far but before continuing I’m trying to master the previous letter so this week I’m repeating the word lesson (For the people interested : 4-8-12-15-17-21-25).

item.title: On the table
item.description: There are a lot of stuff on a table … but how to say that in Thai?

item.title: Welcome to My Thai Note
item.description: This blog intend to keep track of what I’m doing daily to improve my Thai but instead of using a note system which will be local and only for me I decided to use the blog format to share my notes with the world.
